nodes.text: The Organa dig site was the name of a cave located in Kaamos Territory on Alderaan. Around 3643 BBY, a science team of House of Organa residing in the cave held an old holocron retrieved by Jedi, with incriminating evidence against House Thul. As they attempted to crack the holocron in order to reveal its secrets, the cave was raided by an Imperial-aligned individual and the Jedi and Organa forces were anihilated and the holocron reclaimed by the Sith Empire.
